# Introduction

```{r}
library("graphicsutils")
```

# plot0() and plotAreaColor()

```{r, fig.height=6, fig.width=6, fig.cap="plot0() and plotAreaColor()"}
par(mar=c(1,1,1,1), mfrow=c(2,2))
#
plot0()
text(0, 0, "plot0")
#
plot0()
text(0, 0, "plot0")
plotAreaColor()
#
plot0()
plotAreaColor(col="#6792AA")
#
plot0()
plotAreaColor(col="#6792AA", border="grey20", lty=2, lwd=4)
```



# circle() an ellipse()

```{r}
par(mar=c(1,1,1,1), mfrow=c(2,2))
plot0()
circle(0,0,1)
plot0()
circle(0,0,seq(0,1,0.2))
plot0()
circle(0,0,seq(0,1,0.2), lty=2, lwd=1.4)
plot0()
circle(0,0,seq(0,1,0.2), from=pi, col="#BBBBFF88", lty=2, lwd=1.4)
```
